attributes.action: make Rik Mayall's birthday a public holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rik Mayall is god, so his birthday should be a day of worship to him, as Christmas time is to Jesus!
He even out-died Jesus with his quadbike accident. Jesus was dead for three days, Rik was technicaly dead for 5 days.
Rik Mayall needs to be recognised as a genius by everyone!!!

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
